Posts.EditableText: My room description reads "You are in a the hall" or if "You are in prefix..." is disabled then it reads "A the hall". Is there a way to get rid of the "a"?
Posts.HTML: My room description reads "You are in a the hall" or if "You are in prefix..." is disabled then it reads "A the hall". Is there a way to get rid of the "a"?

jcsmcdouall wrote:My room description reads "You are in a the hall" or if "You are in prefix..." is disabled then it reads "A the hall". Is there a way to get rid of the "a"?


I am pretty new to Quest, but I think I can help you. Choose the room in quest -> go to setup tab -> untick the "use default prefix and suffix"

I hope it works for you.
